sentences.en: Ah yes, but think of all the family life they're missing.
sentences.cn: 是这样，不过别忘了他们错过了多少天伦之乐。

sentences.en: all this was of great interest to her, as if she were coming to life after a long sleep.
sentences.cn: 这一切都让她十分感兴趣，使她觉得像是从沉睡中苏醒过来一样。

sentences.en: Bonington spent his entire adult life in France.
sentences.cn: 博宁顿成年后就一直在法国生活。

sentences.en: For her, books were as necessary to life as bread.
sentences.cn: 对她来说，书就像面包一样，是生活必需品。

sentences.en: he lost his life in a car accident.
sentences.cn: 他在一次交通事故中丧生。

sentences.en: He made it his object in life to find the island.
sentences.cn: 他把找到那座岛屿当成自己的人生目标。

sentences.en: He maintained an ambivalent attitude to the Church throughout his long life.
sentences.cn: 在他漫长的一生中，他对基督教信仰始终是一种摇摆不定的态度。

sentences.en: he was standing nearby, large as life.
sentences.cn: 千真万确，他当时就站在旁边。

sentences.en: He’s a life member (= continuing until he dies ) of the club.
sentences.cn: 他是俱乐部的终身会员。

sentences.en: His main aim in life was to have fun.
sentences.cn: 他人生的主要目标就是享乐。

sentences.en: I can't for the life of me understand what it is you see in that place.
sentences.cn: 我无论如何也不明白你到底在那里看见了什么。

sentences.en: I clung on to the tree for dear life.
sentences.cn: 我死命抱住那棵树。

sentences.en: I’ve known John all my life (= since I was born ).
sentences.cn: 我从小就认识约翰了。

sentences.en: if he's a waster then get yourself out of there and get a life.
sentences.cn: 如果他是个废物，你就干脆离开那里，去开始你自己的新生活。

sentences.en: If you love life, life will love you back.
sentences.cn: 热爱生活，生活也会厚爱你。

sentences.en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
sentences.cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有勇气作出改变。

sentences.en: It was one of the best days of my life.
sentences.cn: 那是我一生中最快乐的时光之一。

sentences.en: It's just not enough money to start life over.
sentences.cn: 这些钱根本不够用来开始全新的生活。

sentences.en: Learning goes on throughout life.
sentences.cn: 学习是一生的事。

sentences.en: Married life was not as idyllic as he had imagined.
sentences.cn: 婚姻生活并不像他想象的那么浪漫美好。

sentences.en: Poor diet can lead to a whole range of diseases in later life (= when you are older ).
sentences.cn: 饮食不良会在晚年引发各种疾病。

sentences.en: Raj spent his life caring for others.
sentences.cn: 拉杰一辈子都在关爱他人。

sentences.en: She knew she’d feel guilty for the rest of her life.
sentences.cn: 她知道自己将内疚终生。

sentences.en: She married late in life (= when she was fairly old ).
sentences.cn: 她结婚晚。

sentences.en: She's kicked her drug habit and learned that her life has value.
sentences.cn: 她已经戒了毒，并且认识到了生命可贵。

sentences.en: Sue struggled free and ran for her life.
sentences.cn: 苏挣脱后，拼命地逃走了。

sentences.en: The accident scarred him for life (= for the rest of his life ).
sentences.cn: 这场事故给他留下了终生的创伤。

sentences.en: The comparison of her life to a sea voyage simplifies her experience.
sentences.cn: 把她的人生比作一次海上航行不足以说明她丰富的经历。

sentences.en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
sentences.cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

sentences.en: These days work plays an important part in a single woman's life.
sentences.cn: 现在，工作在单身女性的生活中起着重要作用。

sentences.en: We don’t know much about the poet’s early life (= when he was young ).
sentences.cn: 我们对这位诗人的早年生活所知甚少。

sentences.en: We felt we were living life on several different planes.
sentences.cn: 我们感到大家生活的精神层次各不相同。

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

sentences.en: Williams faces life in prison if convicted of attempted murder.
sentences.cn: 如被判谋杀未遂，威廉斯将面临终身监禁。

sentences.en: You have your whole life ahead of you.
sentences.cn: 你前面还有漫长的人生呢。

words.tran_cn: 无生命的；死气沉沉的；无趣味的

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)[用于强调某人的确在场]确确实实

phrases.phrase: do anything for a quiet life

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)无论如何，即使要我的命
(非正式)开始过更为充实和有意思的生活，开始新生活
（人）（因外表时髦或行为举止大胆而）引人注目的，（行为、服饰等）与众不同的
(非正式)快节奏的生活（尤指带来财富和成功的激情生活）
生活方式，生活习惯；格调
（尤指学术研究或文艺创作）毕生之作；终生事业
生活质量；基本生活条件
现实生活（的）；实际生活（的）
使用寿命；使用期限；耐用年限

phrases.phrase: the life and soul of the party

phrases.tran_cn: 一生；终身保险；终身寿险

trans.tran_cn: 生活，生计，生命，性命，一生，寿命，人生，尘世
trans.tran_en: the period of time when someone is alive
